title: The Birds [DVD]
creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock, Gaumont and Universal Pictures
brief_description: From Daphne Du Maurier’s short story, Hitchcock has created a bizarre and violent allegory for the apocalypse, starring Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor as young lovers who are attached by ferocious birds.

constellations_other.name: Easter Eggs on screen
constellations_other.description: People have been slipping secrets into films, games and television for as long as they have existed.

description: From Daphne Du Maurier’s short story, Hitchcock has created a bizarre and violent allegory for the apocalypse. A peaceful Californian coastal town is set upon by birds of all kinds who start attacking humans with increasing ferocity. Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor star in the film as a pair of young lovers, but the real stars are the realistic special effects, the chilling sounds and music of maestro Bernard Herrmann, and Hitchcock’s gleefully sadistic flair with the film medium. Cast also includes Suzanne Pleshette and Jessica Tandy. Cinematography by Robert Burks.
